collection_holder_name: UMass Amherst Libraries, Special Collections & University Archives
pageContext.collection_description: Audiotape recordings of interviews conducted with members of the Pioneer Valley community for a public radio program. Titles of the shows that aired include: "Portrait of a Farm Woman," "Hadley: the Portrait of an Endangered Town," Keeping Rural Businesses in Business," and "Shepherds, Bumpkins and Farmersâ€™ Daughters."
